description: Great winter dish to warm you up and get a few extra veggies in.
name: Satay Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve ladle the soup and noodles into a large bowl and add veggies and tofu on top. Garnish with fresh coriander and peanuts (optional).
